title: Everything launched today: Nexus 5X & 6P, Chromecast 2, Pixel C, & more
text: Today, a flock of people gathered in an auditorium in San Francisco to hear Google announce a slew of new products including two new phones, next-generation Chromecast devices, and a new Pixel tablet. Here’s our overview of the short-and-sweet event. Nexus 5X and 6P Google unveiled two new Nexus phones: the 5X from LG and the 6P from Huawei. The […] »
